properties.entry: SELECT EMP_ID , EMP_NAME , SALARY , DEPT_TITLE , JOB_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E , JOB J , DEPARTMENT D WHERE E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE AND E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_ID(+)

SELECT EMP_ID , EMP_NAME , SALARY , DEPT_TITLE , JOB_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E , JOB J , DEPARTMENT D WHERE E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE AND E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_ID(+) AND D.DEPT_TITLE = ? ORDER BY HIRE_DATE DESC

SELECT EMP_ID , EMP_NAME , SALARY , DEPT_TITLE , JOB_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E , JOB J , DEPARTMENT D WHERE E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE AND E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_ID(+) AND J.JOB_NAME = ? ORDER BY HIRE_DATE DESC
SELECT EMP_ID , EMP_NAME , SALARY , DEPT_TITLE , JOB_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E , JOB J , DEPARTMENT D WHERE E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE AND E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_ID(+) AND E.EMP_ID = ?;
